Uses of Class
konquest.api.event.KonquestEvent

Packages that use KonquestEvent
Package
Description
konquest.api.event.camp
Events related to barbarian camps.
konquest.api.event.player
Events related to players.
konquest.api.event.ruin
Events related to ruins.
konquest.api.event.territory
Events related to all territories.
konquest.api.event.town
Events related to towns.

  • Uses of KonquestEvent in konquest.api.event.camp

    Subclasses of KonquestEvent in konquest.api.event.camp
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    KonquestCampCreateEvent
    Called when a new camp is created by a barbarian player.
    class 
    KonquestCampDestroyEvent
    Called before a player breaks a camp's bed to destroy it.
    class 
    KonquestCampEvent
    The base camp event.

  • Uses of KonquestEvent in konquest.api.event.player

    Subclasses of KonquestEvent in konquest.api.event.player
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    KonquestPlayerCampEvent
    Called before a barbarian player places a bed in the wild to create their camp.
    class 
    KonquestPlayerCombatTagEvent
    Called when a player is attacked by another player.
    class 
    KonquestPlayerEvent
    The base player event.
    class 
    KonquestPlayerExileEvent
    Called before the given player has been exiled from their current kingdom and made into a barbarian.
    class 
    KonquestPlayerKingdomEvent
    Called before the given player has been assigned to the given kingdom.
    class 
    KonquestPlayerPrefixEvent
    Called after a player changes their accomplishment prefix.
    class 
    KonquestPlayerSettleEvent
    Called before a player settles a new town using the "/k settle" command.

  • Uses of KonquestEvent in konquest.api.event.ruin

    Subclasses of KonquestEvent in konquest.api.event.ruin
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    KonquestRuinAttackEvent
    Called when a player breaks a critical block within a ruin, but before KonquestRuinCaptureEvent
    class 
    KonquestRuinCaptureEvent
    Called before a player captures a ruin, but after KonquestRuinAttackEvent
    class 
    KonquestRuinEvent
    The base ruin event.

  • Uses of KonquestEvent in konquest.api.event.territory

    Subclasses of KonquestEvent in konquest.api.event.territory
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    KonquestTerritoryChunkEvent
    Represents a generic change of a territory's land chunk.
    class 
    KonquestTerritoryMoveEvent
    Called before a player enters or leaves a territory.

  • Uses of KonquestEvent in konquest.api.event.town

    Subclasses of KonquestEvent in konquest.api.event.town
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    KonquestTownAttackEvent
    Called when an enemy player breaks a block within a town.
    class 
    KonquestTownCaptureEvent
    Called before an enemy player captures a town for their own kingdom.
    class 
    KonquestTownDestroyEvent
    Called before a barbarian player destroys a town by breaking its final critical block.
    class 
    KonquestTownEvent
    The base town event.
    class 
    KonquestTownSettleEvent
    Called when a new town is settled by a player.
